title: Cream Cheese Frosting
directions: Beat cream cheese in medium bowl until fluffy. Add butter and beat to blend. Add sugar, sweetened cream of coconut and vanilla extract and beat until well blended.
ingredients: 2 (8-ounce) packages Philadelphia-brand cream cheese, room temperature
1/2 cup canned sweetened cream of coconut (such as Coco LÃ³pez)*
,em>*Canned sweetened cream of coconut is available in the liquor section of most supermarkets nationwide.
